sys_template.name: acs_fw_upgrade
sys_template.template:
change_plan=# Run pre-change snapshots:
(echo __CHG_NUMBER__ ; echo 1) | xtp-snap
# Update repos and set upstream repository location:
# Verify commit has made it to the system:
cd /usr/local/exegy/puppet/data ; git describe --all __COMMIT__
# Stop exelerate:
if [ `mdc-info -main | grep -c Started` -ne 1 ]; then echo 'mdc-info is not responding, press ENTER to continue or press CTRL+C to exit.'; read; fi echo $HOSTNAME | estop
# Backup persist:
if [ -s /export0/archive/Pre___CHG_NUMBER__.tgz ];then echo "File already exists /export0/archive/Pre___CHG_NUMBER__.tgz"; else tar czvf /export0/archive/Pre___CHG_NUMBER__.tgz /usr/local/exegy/mdc ; fi
# Run puppet:
xpuppet -p
# Start exelerate:
estart^backout_plan=Escalate to MSE^u_acs_ref=^short_description=ACS change for upgrading to firmware version: __VERSION__^u_business_objective=To update to firmware version __VERSION__^assignment_group=0148f7bb6fb7a100b13653a11c3ee41d^u_category=1daa2f626f3835005318eef11c3ee4e7^state=13^reason=^description=ACS change for firmware __VERSION__^u_expedited=false^u_expedite_justification=^u_workflow_state=exec_approval^EQ
